page.title: 12HOME LIFE 3.
page.content: A SURVEY BY A GROUP 11 YEAR OLDS - FOOD DRINKS. In our area the most popular was beer which was closely followed by Coke. They prefer cold drinks to hot. BREAKFAST. For breakfast we found Rice- Crispies is the most popular cereal. This wasn't such a good total overall only just beating cornflakes. LUNCH. Skem picked chips with a massive poll. Sausage was hot on their trail while pie, beans and peas followed a long way behind. EVENING MEAL. In our area, the most popular hot food was chips and beans with chips and sausage hot on their track. For sweet they all said cake. SNACKS. The most popular snack was sweets with 46 votes. This was very good because we only asked 62 people. Cake, crisps, burger, sausage-roll and sandwiches each averaged a little under 4 votes.
